resources.string: Unfortunately, due to your current health condition, we will not include you in the vaccination list. We recommend that you consult your physician, and when he approves the vaccination for you, be sure to roll over again.
Please, select the vaccine you like

The effect of the Covid-19 vaccine on the pandemic will depend on several factors. These are, for example: vaccine efficiency, speed and continuity of approval, production and deliveries and the number of people who will be vaccinated. Also, the data on the number is not negligible people who got over Covid-19. This application is made to collect data about citizens who want to be vaccinated, about their health condition, age and choice desired vaccines, all in order to facilitate and accelerate the vaccination process itself. Please make all the above inquiries fill in adequately and correctly, in order to get your vaccination appointment.

If you are currently suffering from Covid-19 or feel that you should not get vaccinated, due to allergies, pregnancy or other health conditions please Click on more information to get instructions on how to proceed. Otherwise continue so we can collect your presonal date.
Your registration has been submitted. Date of vaccination:
